website_summaries.verdict: You'll love the price point on this 600-watt amplifier, which is small enough to fit in many different styles of vehicles.
pros: This powerful small amplifier is able to work in almost any weather conditions, as it has protection on the circuit board from potential moisture damage
Even if you're installing this amplifier in a small vehicle, it should fit because of its small size
cons: This is a monoblock amplifier, which means it only has one channel, preventing bridging

customer_reviews.title: Been blowing fuses since a week after 1 year warranty ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounded great and very loud, but have been blowing fuses on the amp since a week after 1 year warranty expired. Finally it started smoking. Opened it up and a mounting screw on the PC board had worn through the insulation behind it and was touching the chassis. Melted the whole board. 10/1/17 Replaced this amp with another of the same model. This time, I have extremely quiet output with the same set up as before. Double checked speaker with a different amp, works fine. I'll be returning this one for a third try and see if I don't get a lemon again.
customer_reviews.author: Amish Robot

customer_reviews.title: A lot of power in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: Completely amazed by this little amp. Built huge systems as a kid, now just have tunes in the boat. I have it pushing a 10" sub in my boat and it thumps. No ground noise, doesn't get real hot, super clear, and can't believe the power in such a small package. Got caught in a storm a few weeks back where a moderate amount of moisture was around it. Still performing perfectly. Nice job Kenwood!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great power for tight spaces.
customer_reviews.text: For a little over $100 this was a big upgrade to my stock amplifier in a 2009 Mazda Tribute. Price saved me about $90 from other stores. Installation was a breeze and the quality is what I expected from Kenwood. I haven't had enough time to test it thoroughly and will update accordingly. So far the only issue I have is with the input sensitivity (gain). My head unit has 4V preamp but I have to turn the gain up nearly all the way on this amp to produce enough sound. Still testing songs and fiddling with the EQ, Xovers, and gain on head unit.
customer_reviews.author: ElecEnthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Nice Power, Fits Anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Good power for its' size. You're probably planning to use it for a sub or center channel speaker. Be sure to notice that it puts out only 200W at 4 ohms. I used it to power a Skar 8 inch sub and it does OK with the sub set for 2 ohms. Not a powerhouse but fits a lot of places, looks good, and works well. I will probably upgrade to more powerful amp now that my sub is broken in. Comes with wiring harness that has nice, long wires.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Only lowpass
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to power 1-2 speakers (not subs). This amp is limited to lowpass at 200Hz, with no other passthrough options. Nowhere is this stated in the description, and isn't visible in the single photo either.
customer_reviews.author: PalidinoDH

customer_reviews.title: very happy with the sound as well
customer_reviews.text: sits perfectly in the same spot that my explorers factory amp was located. very happy with the sound as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Ingenthron

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed with the power of these little amps ...
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the power of these little amps. It fit in any space. Just miss the bass boost.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little amp for applications with little space. Provides my 8 inch sub with more than enough power.
customer_reviews.author: Juiced99ws6

customer_reviews.title: Stay clear from this seller.
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this piece of junk, it worked one time and died, and of course the seller wont stand behind it
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: GREAT little amp
customer_reviews.text: GREAT little amp!!! It makes my JL audio sub come alive. I liked it so much that I just ordered the 4 channel version for my kids and highs
customer_reviews.author: matthew allison

customer_reviews.title: Great amp but wouldnt say its marine certified
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I bought one about 7 months ago and it ran my 2 12's fine. I wouldn't say its Marine certified I swamped my car and the amp was underwater for maybe 10 mins and the amp was fried. But I loved the amp so much I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Amp just came in and what looks to be used. All the ground and power screws are not attached correctly. Hooked it all up like the other ones I had. Doesn't want to turn on and work. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little compact amp
customer_reviews.text: I got this amp to add a sub to my wife's factory audio system. I was able to install it in a hidden spot because of its compact size. The amp works as advertised and is quite punchy.
customer_reviews.author: Taras

customer_reviews.title: Good reliable amp!
customer_reviews.text: This amp worked perfect for my truck subwoofer. I have it pushing a single 8-inch Cerwin Vega. It has great frequency setting capabilities. Has been reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: Smaller in size then I expected but underrated, great sounding amp
customer_reviews.author: Ernst71

customer_reviews.title: I have it on 2 alpine s series 10 and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have it on 2 alpine s series 10 and it is thumping . It surprised me for sure
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good Small Compact Amp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance to use for our Harley Motorcycle. Size was nice and small however there is no way to adjust from high to low so we ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brumett

customer_reviews.title: A nice small AMP
customer_reviews.text: This amp was perfect for the space we had available. Small yet good sound.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong for the size. Pushing two bazooka 10 inch tubes on my rzr. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wambles

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at the good clean power it gave
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Surprised at the good clean power it gave, thank you Kenwood and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Jack

customer_reviews.title: Power Inputs are Junk
customer_reviews.text: Power Input Cradle broke just after return window; do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Ian Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to say about this product. Really satisfied I was looking for a discret, small and powerful amp and I found this one. Great product
customer_reviews.author: BenC

customer_reviews.title: Small compact powerfull
customer_reviews.text: Very compact Runs cool So much bass that I set the gain to 0 And sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Jake D

customer_reviews.title: First one was DOA, second worked perfect
customer_reviews.text: The amp was dead out of the box, I'm in the return process and a new one is on the way. Hopefully the second one will work. The second amp arrived and worked perfectly. The power seems adequate to push a Kicker 8" sub in a sealed enclosure. It is very small and fits very easily under a front seat.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Way more powerful than it says. Pushes a 10" sub awesome.
customer_reviews.author: John Z.

customer_reviews.title: A great little micro amp for powering subs
customer_reviews.text: I've got this installed beneath the steering wheel in a 2015 Wrangler driving a pair of 4ohm Tang Band 5.25" subwoofers (2ohm mono) in the stock lower dash pods. The combination hits like you wouldn't believe. My only complaint is that the amp doesn't have a switch to allow you to run it full range since I would prefer to solely use my HU's (Alpine CDE-W265BT) crossover. At the current price of $75, this little amp is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It certainly meets my expectation. Such a small amp but with such power to drive my JBL subwoofer!
customer_reviews.author: Iven Ong

customer_reviews.title: Great amp, very compact and fits in small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great amp, very compact and fits in the spare parts compartment in my Scion TC under the trunk floor. I paired this with a Pioneer TSSWX2502 10-Inch Shallow-Mount sub, and the sound is perfect for my little car! Plenty of bass while being small and compact without taking up much trunk room.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Impressive build quality at the price with some caveats.
customer_reviews.text: Decent little amp at a good price but signal sense did not work out of the box, verified 6v DC offset on speaker wires with full range signal and even with radio cranked to the max signal sense would not kick in. Weatherproof marine covers are nice and build quality and controls seem to be better than others in the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly...

customer_reviews.title: I needed an amp to fit in a tiny space. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this little amp a 4 because it does the job for the size. Its downfall is that I don't think it's as powerful as advertised and tends to lose its thump when it gets hot so make sure it is in a well ventilated area. It seems to have a good frequency range.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton J. Kidder

customer_reviews.title: Small and Mighty!
customer_reviews.text: Gone are the days when you needed large amps and wasted space to produce big sound. I am using this amp to push a slim mount SKAR 12 wired at 2ohms and it sounds great! I mounted the the amp and a 4 cahnnel kenwood in the small storage space behind the passenger seat in a 1978 Corvette. I now have an amazing sound system with minimal space used.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I can't return mine because I bought it last year. I let it sit for a while before I finally upgraded my bikes sound system. Upon unboxing I realized something was wrong. The amp has internal damage. Likely do to poor handling by warehouse/delivery. I suggest everyone open and thoroughly inspect your products as soon as they're delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar a.

customer_reviews.title: great amp
customer_reviews.text: I use this to power a 300w sub and it has been quite a good sound improvement.
customer_reviews.author: David Y.

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Super small, easy to hide and powers 15" kicker no problem
customer_reviews.author: Blue2cc

customer_reviews.title: Good bass
customer_reviews.text: Great little amp I have it bumping 2 8” pioneers in a sealed box on my 2016 goldwing
customer_reviews.author: Rider 4 life

customer_reviews.title: Great power, and sound in a very small package.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little amp! It is a solid performer with built in low pass crossover adjustment as well as a sensitivity adjustment. It does a terrific job driving my two 10 inch subwoofers at 2 ohms and it has barely gotten warm. This is a very small amp, you should have no trouble finding a spot for it, it is smaller than a toddlers shoe box. It barely gets warm at all, I would have no problem installing this under a seat in a car and forgetting about it. The sound is clean and pure. I played tracks I've listened to for decades and they sounded terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Peters

customer_reviews.title: Marine use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to power 2 kicker 10" 4ohm subs in my boat. Wired in parallel for the 2ohm load and it sounds fantastic. Small, compact and great amp so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Class D amp
customer_reviews.text: Nice little Class D amp. I have it pushing a single sub. It does a great job and doesn't get too hot. Small enough to tuck this thing just about anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Save time and money
customer_reviews.text: Tested this amp for a few weeks now and it's running strong as advertised. I bought this amp for my single sub and bought the Kenwood KAC-M3004 for my speakers. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucelle Phan

customer_reviews.title: Small and powerful amp that creates many install posibilities.
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful for a small amp. Love it. It is installed in a stealth set up and can be placed in many locations. Opens up possibility. So far no issues. Auto turn on works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P.

customer_reviews.title: For the price the output is great, replaced a factory amp and puts out way ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this in my truck behind the glove box. For the price the output is great, replaced a factory amp and puts out way more power (measured).
customer_reviews.author: NKurth

customer_reviews.title: Good power in a small chassis
customer_reviews.text: Super compact amp. Fits with room to spare under the drivers seat, using in conjunction with kenwood head unit, and pushing a small pioneer 8" sub . Didn't want to break the bank on car audio components, and this was the ticket. Much better full sound.
customer_reviews.author: Nic T

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe this amp is 600w, but it rocks. I have this running a single JL 10" in a sealed box and it bumps. It is one of the smallest amps I've seen and I had low expectations. It somehow is really very good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mmmk

customer_reviews.title: Compact size....!!
customer_reviews.text: Very compact amp, going to just for a rear sub set in my VW Tiguan.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Small footprint, big BOOM
customer_reviews.text: This little amp sounds amazing! I have it powering a 10" sub in my SSV glovebox enclosure for my RZR41000. I would definitely buy this amp again!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Small, powerful, cool, efficient.
customer_reviews.text: This powers a JL 8W1V3-4 sub perfectly. It hits hard. One of the few micro amps with gain and crossover controls, trust me, I researched them all. Bonus: it was one of the cheapest. Extra credit: it outputs higher than rated, just go search YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Austin W.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, great instructions, perfect for my 03 Rubicon.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Or Amy  K.

customer_reviews.title: Love the sheer size of this amp works awesome and easy to hide in my Jeep Wrangler.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sheer size of this amp works awesome and easy to hide in my Jeep Wrangler.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fisch

customer_reviews.title: Tiny little amp but it works great if your working within tight spaces and/or on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Tiny little amp but it works great if your working within tight spaces and/or on a tight budget its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H

customer_reviews.title: Great amp for a small subwoofer.
customer_reviews.text: Great amp for a small subwoofer. Used it to replace the factory subwoofer amp in a Range Rover Classic and it was a great improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Snelling

customer_reviews.title: Small and potent
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little amp!!!!! Powers my Rockford fosgate 8" sub in my side by side flawlessly!!!! Not much bigger than a pack of smokes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Love it. For it's size
customer_reviews.text: Love it. For it's size, it is impressive. Paired with a tsswx2502 pioneer 10 box it makes the sound full and clean. Decent bass. Probably slightly weak for this sub but makes the bass I was looking for. Love that it doesn't dim my headlights and punish my electrical system
customer_reviews.author: Mary Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great woofer amp, no for the high end.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great amp with true power. The only thing is, it is only to power a woofer as it has no function for full power.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Really didn't think this amp would really be powerful enough to run a decent sub, but I am really impressed that it does it with ease. I have it on a Alpine Type S 10" sub and it really motivates the sub with good clean power. Best thing is that it's in a place that doesn't have a lot of air flow and it still doesn't over heat. I just took a 5 hour drive in 90 degree heat and had the volume turned up a good amount and it still kept rocking just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Wood

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: got it ups on a wensday installed it on a Saturday and it stopped working on tuesday
customer_reviews.author: david puckett

product_meta.title: Kenwood KAC-M3001 600W Class D Monoblock Compact Digital Car/ATV/Marine Certified Amplifier
product_meta.description: Many of today’s power sports have very limited space to work in and tend to be a harsh environment for electronics because of the exposure to outdoor environments. Kenwood’s compact performance amplifiers are small in size so they fit even the most limited installation areas. The amplifiers also use a conformal coated main PCB (printed circuit boards) which offer extra layers of protection to help prevent moisture or damp air from damaging the product.
feature_bullets: Compact Series Monoblock Class D Car / Marine Amplifier
RMS Power Rating: 4 ohms: 200 watts x 1 chan. / 2 ohms: 300 watts x 1 channel
Max power output: 600 watts x 1 channel
Pulse Width Modulated MOSFET power supply
LED power (green) and protect (red) indicators: Soft start turn-on

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars129 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
